root.name: Gundam Breaker
root.description: OverviewIn the third person action game, you play as plastic models, as the 1/144, 1/100, and 1/60 scale digital plamo fight to damage each other against the backdrop of dioramas and miniature sets. As of March 14th there is a free beta version available on the Japanese Playstation Network.GameplayThe game plays similarly to Phantasy Star Online. Players choose missions to tackle while inside a hub world. Once a mission is chosen players are dumped into a collection of zones, progressing through puzzles and groups of enemies to make their way to the final zone where a boss will be waiting. As you play, enemies drop various loot and parts for customizing your mobile suit, allowing you to mix and match parts of various suits together for wild combinations.
